CustomField.formula: IF ( INCLUDES ( Apttus_Config2__AttributeValueId__r.APT_PostBillPay_Volume_threshold__c , "0 – 25,000" ), "0 – 25,000; ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( Apttus_Config2__AttributeValueId__r.APT_PostBillPay_Volume_threshold__c , "25,001 – 100,000" ), "25,001 – 100,000; ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( Apttus_Config2__AttributeValueId__r.APT_PostBillPay_Volume_threshold__c , "100,001 – 500,000" ), "100,001 – 500,000; ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( Apttus_Config2__AttributeValueId__r.APT_PostBillPay_Volume_threshold__c , "500,001 – 1,500,000" ), "500,001 – 1,500,000; ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( Apttus_Config2__AttributeValueId__r.APT_PostBillPay_Volume_threshold__c , "1,500,001 – 3,000,000" ), "1,500,001 – 3,000,000; ",null )
CustomField.label: Volume Threshold
